name: White Cell (BlueCatBlackCat)
description:
White Cell is a roguelite action game being developed for mobile and PC. Enjoy intense fast paced combat while defeating hordes of enemies. Earn currency from battle and purchase lots of fun to use upgrades to kill even more enemies!

This is our first pre-alpha demo. We would love to hear your thoughts on the game! Please fill out the feedback survey  in the link below or feel free to leave any feedback on the demo you have in the comments.
White Cell Pre-Alpha Demo Feedback Survey

Keep up to date with White Cell's progress on youtube & twitter

YouTube Channel

Twitter: @BlueCatBlackCat

Email: bluecatblackcatatelier@gmail.com

CONTROLS:

    Move: WASD (PC), Drag on left side of screen (Mobile)
    Attack: IJKL (PC), Flick on right side of screen (Mobile)
    Dash: Spacebar (PC), Double tap on right side of screen (Mobile)
